front.title: Signaling RPKI Validation Results from a Route-Server to Peers

abstract.t: This document defines the usage of the BGP Prefix Origin Validation State Extended Community [I-D.ietf-sidr-origin-validation-signaling] to signal RPKI validation results from a route-server to its peers. Upon reception of RPKI validation results peers can use this information in their local routing decision process.
